title: Bug 109718 - Put large content in text item, the tips display the content in one line
description:

ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: The tips should be displayed in the given format
Actual Result: The tips are displayed in one line
OB: When saving and placing the mouse on the text item, the tips are displayed in one line instead of the expected format.
EB: The parameter for element name and property name should be provided to display the tips correctly.
SR:
1. Put large content in a text item.
2. Save the text item.
3. Place the mouse on the text item and observe the tips.
